title: Review
text:
I love this app for so many reasons I  am a horse rider and I have my
Mom take videos of me riding the horses and then I will come on and this app and screen record music and add it to my music vids with the horses and this app is great for all ages and you can customize your content and you don’t talk to people this is a really fun way to edit your videos and if you don’t have social media you don’t have to link it to tik tok even tho it may give that option I respect every parent who says that their child can’t have social media my parents say I can’t and I’m actually happy because social media is very dangerous and there are a lot of people that teens like me have not been exposed to and people do and say horrible things so this app is great for having some fun being creative and able to use your imagination I love this app and they’ve done a great job with it.🙂🫶🏻

title: Great but needs some fixes
text: CapCut is a GREAT APP you literally should definitely get it, I have been using it for a year now and i love it so much and I have been suggesting it to my friends so much but one did not wanna get it because she think funnimate is “better” but there is a few things I would fix from CapCut like how it takes up so much storage and everything. Right now I can’t edit anything on CapCut bc it says to lower your storage when it’s fine. I finally deleted some stuff then it said to blah blah do something and access it on setting so I look on setting and I tried to do all the changes it asked me for BUT there was no button of anything to change it so I tihnk that’s annoying because I always edit on there all the time and I can’t edit now I don’t know for how longer but if you see this I suggest you get the app because is AMAZING but if the developer sees it can you please change these problems I listed out 😊

title: Small problem (Please Read 🍵)
text: First of all, CapCut is a great app for beginners and it’s easy once you get used to it though I’ve been using CapCut for a while and I can’t help but want more. Also there is a problem with the storage, if you make a video on CapCut and save it, you can find out that CapCut itself actually is the cause of full storage, not the video itself, but I have found some solutions, use less effects and add ones so you can have less storage it’ll take, but if you really wanna use a lot, delete it off CapCut after saving it so you can only access it in your video album, this prevents most to all the storage that one video will take up, but the problem with that is, if you notice a mistake while watching it, you can’t go back. It’s not easy to edit on top of it so you’ll have to live with it. I get annoyed by this but I need to save storage to make more videos. I hope you understand. Pls fix it.🌼🌸🌵

title: My story-ish of how I found CapCut
text: I LOVE THIS APP SO MUCH!!!! When I was younger I had always dreamed of making cool videos (even though I’m not even allowed to have ANY social media platforms. T-T) but I didn’t know apps like this even existed because I was very dumb haha. Then my younger sister showed me a different video editing app (which also go’s to show that I was an idiot. 😂) and I was so happy! However, it had the apps name all over the videos and there wasn’t really much I could do on that app.  Then I discovered CapCut!! I have been able to make so many of the videos I’ve always dreamed of making. It also seems like there is an incredible update on here everyday. I know I can’t really show anyone my videos besides my family and friends, but this app has become an immense part of my life and I’m beyond grateful for it. ♥️ The creators are truly appreciated and admired by me. ♥️

title: How to post
text: So i have watched many videos on how to post on capcut and I can’t figure out how to. Something I have to be over 18 in live in the US, other say, I just have to edit a lot. But no matter how do I try I just can’t figure it out. I even read my account to make it say that I was 21 and that did not work. And then I already usually edit a lot, so I just tried downloading to device and clicking underwear. It says upload TikTok, but there was nothing under there. How do you upload? And if I have missed something, please say. And the reason I give you a five star is because it is still amazing and I use CapCut every single day I just might think it’s my fault I can’t find how to post a capcut so I rated capcut a five star I definitely recommend using this app. There are many ways to edit your videos for your TikTok account. Thank you for this amazing app!

title: Ads slowly becoming more frequent
text: I’ve been using CapCut for 3 years now and it’s been great. I’ve had no issues whatsoever. It’s just after they’ve started the premium subscription to get access to all of the affects and what not. I didn’t mind because from my perspective, some of the stuff that was premium I didn’t even use so I didn’t really care. As I’m writing this, a week ago there were no pop up ads until after couple days ago, it’s popping up. I understand that CapCut has to provide ads to keep everything free but how come we didn’t need any premium membership for anything. I can pay the monthly subscription for CapCut I just choose not to because it’s ridiculous on how an app that had EVERYTHING for free a year or two ago, turn into a subscription and now I’m thinking that eventually, it’s just gonna be filled with ads. Still gonna use the platform as everything i need right now is still free but once it isn’t I’m going elsewhere.

title: It’s the best you can get on a phone
text:
I’ve seen a few mobile editors, not too many, but out of the free ones, this definitely gives you everything you’ll need for what you pay for. While you may not get incredibly fancy features like a lot of audio tools, you do get a lot to work with. 
My only suggestions are, as mentioned earlier, maybe some more audio tools like free adjustments of pitch and bass and such, and a speed adjustment for the entire video. Many times I’ll be trying to line up a photo or video with the best of some audio, but it’s so hard because i cannot slow down everything at once and do what I’m trying to accomplish and I end up spending 5-10 minutes trying to match one beat to a frame. A simple tab that make the entire video slowed down or sped up, without impacting the individual speed settings if existing clips.

title: Good but problem..
text: I love this app, I use it to edit all my videos and pictures! I think it’s really amazing if your a beginner at editing. It’s very easy to learn. And they even have tutorials on how to do stuff on the app. But there’s one problem that irritates me. When I’m watching one of my videos I edited on CapCut sometimes it does not work and goes black when I can clearly see I did not put black on my video. And sometimes I can’t see my video. I’ve tried turning it off and on etc. But sometimes it finally comes back on and it’s not black anymore. Also sometimes when that happens I tried getting out of the app and getting back in. And then when I go back some of the things I did before I got out of the app is not there anymore. This is really annoying, there’s no words to describe how my much I hate this. And then sometimes I even have to start over. If you get really mad easily then I don’t suggest this app. Because it has a ton of beyond annoying glitches!

title: Simple with great features! Hopefully glitches will be improved
text:
Love this app so much. Maintains the quality of my clips, the lighting/hue/sharpen/etc is great. You can even import clips from Google Drive straight into your open project! Lots of cool effects, and while it’s simple and easy to use, the features provide me with lots of opportunity to make my edits more advanced if I put in the effort. 

My only complaints are glitch-related— 1st and most frustrating, the audio, once exported, is frequently a tad offset; 2nd, the exported product includes extra frames that I can’t find in-app (no matter how much I trim off); 3rd, several of the transitions lag or get jerky; and 4th, lastly, it could just be me, but I’ve never been able to get match-cut to work. 

Hopefully those 4 things will improve in updates, because it’s a fantastic app that I am super, super grateful to use for free.

title: It’s amazing but becoming a creator
text:
The app is super amazing but…  you have to use so much information to become a creator. And like me I have so many great videos that I want people to use and I can’t because I don’t have some of the apps that you have to have to fill out the information to become one. And the new “pro” stuff is kinda unfair because some people are js trying to make videos and the good effects you have to use pro to get them so maybe better effects and filters without having to have pro. And the hate comments. I get that you get money for it but the people need to start getting kicked off for a little time for mean comments. And that’s the same with inappropriate comment. Like if the video gets reported bc there’s little kids on this app. Like it’s 12+ for a reason. But over all the app is rlly good. Js needs a couple bug fixes. And pls more effects and filters plsss. 

     Thank you.

title: Love the app, but now I’m having issues.
text: I love Capcut, it’s been a tremendous help as a new editor and it’s been so fun making new creations. But I’ve had issues ever since the update. I was working on a project, when I noticed a bunch of the font styles vanish mid-project, and I couldn’t find them to reappear for a good 15 mins before it finally worked again. Now I’m having an issue where I cannot save my edit because I’m supposedly using a “Glitch” pro effect for text. But the only glitch effect I am currently using is apart of the free effects offered within the app, I’ve checked every text and even video effects just to make sure I wasn’t missing something but I’m definitely not using anything Pro. Once this is fixed, I will change my review— but until then, Capcut is essentially broken for me at the moment. No sense in starting a new project if it is going to bug out and won’t let me save my work. 🫡🤧

title: It’s good bit there are problems…
text: At first this app was really good and simple for me as a beginner. Now it has a lot of bugs, first of all when i try to make a edit it cuts of the sude of it like it is a phone sized frame. I have tried changing the crops but it won’t work. Also i don’t edit on a phone, i edit on a ipad. Another bug with this is that i like my ipad side ways but when i open up the app it is the opposite way, it is really annoying, i  have to remove the app first then open it again. Also sometimes when im editing and want to add a photo it says “sorry no photos.” Or something like that even though i saved photos for my edits litterly 10 secounds ago. These are the top bugs that i find really annoying. Please fix these, i really like calcut and it is a awesome app but when it comes to editing it has problems. I really like to edit on this app but with the bugs it has i don’t think i can anymore. So please the developers of CapCut pleaee fix these bugs.

title: Good app for beginner editors!
text:
Capcut is a good app if you want to edit your videos/make videos as content or even just for fun. If you are a beginner editor this app would be perfect for you! It comes with a bunch of templates and is better for beginners because it is easier to work with and less confusing than other editing apps.  So I recommend this app to start or to get better at editing, or even just making slight adjustments to videos!

There is just one SMALL problem with capcut. If you see something sooo cool you use it and export your video, that thing is some premium thing you have to buy for 70 DOLLARS. I get that it comes with really cool stuff but why make it so expensive. I would definitely buy it if it was cheaper. A reasonable price would be maybe 20 dollars? But not 70. But overall, great app and I am looking forward to new updates! :)

title: amazing app!! however…
text: I love this app sooooo much! in my opinion it’s the best editing tool out there. it’s simple to use but also works super well. however, i have one complaint. i used to love capcut even more because the best the about it was that everything was free!! but recently (a few months ago i believe) they made it so if you wanted to use some certain features, you had to get a pro membership. this has since really irritated me, because the whole point of capcut was that it was a great app, but it was better because it was FREE! now it’s not and I’m just a bit upset :( im just hoping they remove this membership thingy, though I doubt they will. I think they made the membership thing once the app started getting popular. they finally started seeing more and more people using it, so they wanted to capitalize off of it. this really saddens me. but oh well, you can’t have everything I guess.

title: Eh. I don’t know what to think about this.
text:
I like this app, but…I just wish it had the option to remove background noises. It’s really cool how when you switch to the “Template” tab, it looks like your in social media, so it’s an up side. Down side: I do a lot of my edit on my iPad, and sometimes, it turns either, skinny, horizontal, all the directions I don’t want it to be. So I have to close it and open it. Um, let’s see. Hmmmm…There’s like almost nothing bad about CapCut. I’ve tried to find other apps to replace it, cuz it’s getting a bit old for me, but it’s impossible! I’ve had moments where I want to delete it, but then, I think to myself, “Should I? Should I not?” Then I don’t. It’s almost like CapCut was MADE for all devices. Apple, and other brands! I gave it a 4 star, because it’s not like, “OMG I LOVE THIS APP, ITS SOOOO AMAZING!!!” For me. Instead it’s like, “Lets make an edit today! Hmm what should I do though? I know! LETS GO TO TEMPLATES!!” 

In summary: 
CapCut’s ok.

title: No internet problem
text: So, I have a problem with CapCut that just happened an hour ago. I have been using CapCut for over 2 months and it has never done this. So randomly while making a video, I was going to use the blending effect but then when I try to use it, it only shows the normal effect and it tells me that there is no connection even when I’m connected. I noticed that Filters don’t even work either. Not even animations, which I need for text right now. And speaking of text, I can’t even use text options now. And now the app won’t even let me use stock videos. I tried everything, from disconnecting and reconnecting VPN, restarting the iPad, updating app, and even deleting the app [I made sure everything was exported first] and nothing worked. So I do not know what to do now, please help me. I have been using this app for over 2 months and I need this fixed immediately.

title: I LOVE IT 😍
text: It’s probably my favorite app on my iPad I love editing now just because of that app it inspires me and I make edits of me and my friends and they all love it so that’s another plus of the app! I love that you can use these funny filters! And be creative with stuff! But the only thing is that when I was trying to flip the camera around to use the funny filters it wouldn’t flip around and It had been staying flipped around for the past few weeks but then it just randomly flipped around the right way one day so that was weird.. 😂 and do you know the thing where you can choose videos and photos to edit I love that feature! I just think Cap cut one of the best apps ever and it lets you unleash your creativity I never knew I really had such a love of editing until now I really recommend buying it creators of Cape Cod I hope you see this!😆🍓♥️🍌

title: Very good but some inappropriate content
text:
First off, this is an amazing app. I love to edit on this platform and will continue doing so. However, there are some concerns with inappropriate agendas and some dark content. There is nothing wrong with the private editing platform, in which you edit your own. But, there is a part of CapCut that allows you to go onto a tiktok like platform and watch others edits for free (unless you sign into an account and buy advantages, of course.) Nonetheless, that means anyone can post whatever they want. There are a lot of edits that include dark content that may disturb young editors. Some edits that are based on Demon Slayer may include blood, South Park edits based on inappropriate messages, and others. Some edits may include nudity and disturbing references. Foul language is used to many times that it may influence others tongues. 

   Now, I’d like to talk about a topic that may offend others, so please forgive me if anything that may be harsh, but lgbtq references. Children don’t need to be exposed to that until they are ready. There are edits of people of the same gender making out and lying in bed together. It disgusts me even as a person that respects everyone. 

    I hope you read this before you purchase this app as a young editor. I started this editing platform at a very young age and regret to do so.
    Thank you,
    Zezetop1106

title: CapCut is one of the best editing apps.!
text:
CapCut is a great app but there is something wrong with CapCut on my device. I logged into my TikTok account for the first time, I’ve never logged in to my TikTok account on CapCut. It removed my access to allowing all my photos ever since I logged in. I’ve been stressed out about this I was supposed to post a video today but I cannot if CapCut won’t let me allow my photos. Please fix this ASAP. Thank you!
 Hi I am back with more news! I tried deleting and reinstalling CapCut but nothing chanced and now my videos that I have not finished are gone. I am very sad about that. There is no other app i use for editing and if this does not get fixed I might have nothing to do except watch videos. But I love making videos and uploading them to my fans so it breaks my heart to see that I am not able to post videos for them💔

title: My opinions!
text:
GOOD: Capcut is hands down the best editing app I know and is good for beginners, it’s a great social media for younger kids so there less exposed to inappropriate content (now I’m not saying there isn’t any on capcut but it’s hard to find it unless you search for it) capcut is a great learning experience and great to find people your age, I’ve made many “friends” on capcut and I’ve talked to a few of my idols before! It’s a really good app and easy to learn.
BAD: I don’t have a lot of bad things to say about capcut, the ads can be a bit annoying but there’s not much, however I don’t like the applying system. I’ve applied to be a creator multiple times. I follow the guidelines, I submit original edits and it’s nothing bad, I’m a gacha creator but its constantly denied. Please fix it and give people a chance, no I don’t have TikTok so I can’t do that. Besides that it’s altogether a great editing app and I definitely recommend.

title: good but could use improvements
text: I've had CapCut for a little over a year. When I first downloaded it, I was impressed at how the app was completely free with no premium features. Now there are certainly quite a few premium-only features, but this doesn't bother me too much. Really, the only negative thing I have to say about the app is that it lags a lot sometimes, especially on the desktop version. Sometimes when I'm exporting something in full quality, it'll get stuck around 60% and then kick me out of the app. This is a very minor issue though since it doesn't happen a lot. Other times though, when I'm editing something that has a lot of keyframes, overlays, or effects, the app will essentially stop working altogether and freeze, but this is understandable because I tend to add quite a few overlays haha. Overall though it's a pretty good app that's easy to use!

title: The best you can find on a phone
text: No ads, no subscription or pro version, no bars on the side. This app is perfect for people who are new to editing, it’s totally free and doesn't beg you for a subscription every 10 seconds, and the amount of editing choices you have at hand are amazing,  I’ve had capcut for around a year or 2 now and the only thing that I don’t like is the amount of storage it takes up but that’s not their fault. Definitely recommend it, and it’s easy to use on a phone, sometimes if you have big fingers though you’ll have a difficult time making short split videos or clicking the video in between the two splits if you cut them close to each other. Other than that this app is the best free app out there on mobile for editing/making movies and trailers, I’ve had so much fun with this app it’s amazing!

title: Great Editing!
text: Great Editing App no, annoying pay for everything things like you don’t have to pay to edit, only the premium but it’s still not bad, you only have to pay to send the premium to people, but I find that ok! It is amazing editing! Also all the movement effects, stickers, and just effects are great! They are all key to perfecting a video, also the text feature and being able to create your own look with the text, once you find out how but I think YES! You should so get this app if you want to edit great vids or gifs! Oh I totally forgot you can make a gif with a feature! I can’t explain it well how to, so you can search up how, people there might have ways how to or not, I’m not totally sure! Or just figure out everything out yourself! That’s what I did by just exploring through all the options.

title: Amazing program! Just a couple of things…
text:
I have used CapCut as an editing program for a few years now, and I absolutely love it! It’s my favorite program to use, especially if you want smooth video edits. The effects, transitions, everything looks so smooth and satisfying, and is relatively simple to use and understand. 
However, I am disappointed in the “Pro” section. I always looked forward to this program being a free, easy to use app and use effects freely. I was extremely disappointed to see that I can’t use some of my favorite effect (such as the “Smart Sharpen” effect) for my videos. It’s so sad to see that happen, and with transitions, filters, voice effects, etc. 
I would only request to remove that filter to make it accessible to everyone, so people can edit freely and easily without needing to worry about any extra fees.
Otherwise, an amazing program.

title: Very good just some issues
text: I really like the app and it is very easy to use, but there are 2 tiny issues that I’ve faced while using it. Every time I enter the app it rotates and turns sideways so I have to aggressively turn my device side to side to get it back in my preferred rotation. I also had a hard time adding multiple short pictures for an animation because every time I tried to check my work to see how it looked it was VERY choppy and I had to save the entire video just to see how a tiny snippet looked which made it hard to check mistakes. These both got so annoying it was hard to get motivated to even use the app. Again it’s very good and I suggested this to many people but theses issues really bother me so some how fix it if you can, not sure if it’s just my device but my device is very new so I would be worried if it was.

title: Amazing App, Just Three Things
text:
I’ve been using Capcut for some time, and it’s been amazing! Though from the title, I have three minor complaints- nothing too serious though. 
Number one: you have to individually select the pictures/videos instead of being able to select and drag- which doesn’t seem too annoying at first, but kills your time when having to select hundreds of pictures at once 😅
Number two: You can only select one picture/video for overlay at a time. Again, it doesn’t seem too annoying at first, but increases later on. For example, using a green screen. The green screen would be the main, while the others that would be on top would be the overlay. So it just gets annoying after a while.
Number three: The animations sometimes don’t show up when you play it. 
That’s it!

title: Plz read
text: I just put five star so you could see this. I am very mad I love CapCut OK you know what I mean it’s a pretty good app I thought when I first got it now no matter how much Internet I have it will not load anything and also now that I get on other apps, I notice that it needs more and I am being serious they just need to fix it, so no matter how much Internet do I do if I add a photo to a template it will not let me see the template after I add the photo it won’t even let me see what the photo looks like in the template and also it will not let me make my own thing. It says that I can’t load my photo even though I have the best Internet I’m talking star link but it will not let me see it or use it so if you’re about to get the app you need to see this like I said, I only give it five star so you can see it buy it I mean the review

title: Terrible
text: I had this app two years ago with an old phone and I loved it. I could get so many good ideas from the templates and I loved it so much. Then I got a new phone about a year ago and I transferred all of my data from my old phone to my new phone and I thought for sure my CapCut edits and all my data would stay and I’d be able to use it again but it signed me out of the app and wouldn’t let me back in. It kept saying no internet please retry later. I live in a great area with excellent service and great WiFi but it just wouldn’t work. I deleted the app from my phone and redownloaded it several times and even checked in my settings to make sure the WiFi was good for the app and nothing works. My friends all use CapCut with no problems and I have no clue why mine isn’t working. I’d love to see how I can get this fixed and I wonder if this has happened to anyone else. I really want this app back again because I loved editing and making new videos but I can’t now and I haven’t been able to for 8 months. Someone please tell me what’s wrong.

title: CapCut and new update
text:
I love CapCut and it is such a good editing app but I think I had a better experience when younger when there was no pro the CapCut pro feature made the app a lot worse it took away so many good things that were for free before but now you have to pay for it i really want this feature to be gone for good it makes me want to delete this app and go to another app but I really do like this app and it taught me how to edit so I will not be deleting it 
If you just want a push In editing this is your app and if you want to buy the pro feature it will be 10 times more better
But in the past all these features were free like CapCut pro is the most stupidest idea CapCut has ever made 
But this app is very useful and help me edit my videos though personally it is now in my top ten delete if phone is full app because of the pro feature 
Anyway I hope this review helped if you are just a small editor then this is the app.

title: Superior to any other special-effects app
text: I was really becoming irritated by the severely limiting special effects on TickTock, and then my girlfriend on TickTock suggested CapCut. I was totally blown away but what I could do with this incredible app. The effects were superior and I love The video transparency affects to create stunning videos. I am a creator and a singer however I would really like to see some nice echo and vocal effects in the audio section of CapCut. Stuff like allowing you to have different echo, reverberation affects when adding vocals to your videos. And also having control over the reverb and echo delay time etc. Additionally it would be fantastic to have a fade in, and fade out of the visual effects so they could blend in more effectively. Other than these two features this is my app it’s incredible and I just love love love it. Best app ever for special effects. Thank you so much CapCut 💛💛💛🧡🧡🧡❤️❤️❤️

title: Awful storage space
text: I adore Capcut, it’s a wonderful editor but there’s a massive issue with the space it takes up. While generally its less than 700MB it will randomly triple that and fill up all of your phone staging and make it impossible to film anything on your camera or save pictures due to “insufficient storage” which is just untrue. The only way to fix this is delete the app and then redownload it- loosing all of your files. You’d think that because you can have an account on CC all your projects would be saved but no. This means if the glitch occurs you have to download every single project, delete the app, reinstall it and add every video back in and just hope the editing still works from there without too many issues. It’s happened twice to me and is really really unfortunate and might drive costumers away from the product if they don’t realize it’s a glitch.

title: Amazing But a bit glitchy
text: It’s an amazing app and has so many ways you can edit videos but it is glitchy and when I downloaded the app I noticed when I made my first edit that it was glitchy but my battery was at 23 percent so I thought it was my battery level so I charged my phone to 100 percent and when I was done making the edit and played it to see what the end result was and it was not as glitchy but still a bit glitchy. But thats my only concern about this app truly it’s a good app to do edits on and has lots of ways to make your edits fun to create it does not take a long time to get the hang of the controls it’s pretty easy to me. It’s a nice app and a fun experience I have been looking for a editor app that is easy to use because all of the editor apps I have downloaded have confusing controls and CapCut have easy controls and it takes a few minutes to learn them.

title: The new update :(
text: I’ve been using Capcut for 7 months now. It has to be one of the best mobile editing programs out there. It is super easy to comprehend and I use it for all my edits. However, the new update has initiated some issues ONLY for my iPad. Adjusting the lighting of a clip AND masking doesn’t apply to keyframes anymore. Instead, it applies for the whole clip. Not only that, but moving and fixing the fade for masking is disabled as well. The buttons don’t show up and I can’t adjust the size, shape, or move the mask around. All of these things work for my phone, but my iPad is up to date and these features aren’t working for me on it. These two things are something that I depend on a lot in editing. Please fix this, I would highly appreciate it! Edit: Masking works now! Hoping adjust and masking with keyframes get fixed too

title: AMAZING APP!!!
text: I’ve tried a lot of editing apps and I didn’t find one that didn’t have ads, or would not let me use most of the features because I needed premium. But CapCut is way different. There’s so many special features, filters, stickers and many many ways to edit a clip or video, it’s super easy to use, you can remove the watermark without paying or subscribing to anything, no ads, you can use all of the features without a premium and it is super fun to use. You can even reverse, mirror, all kinds of different things that other editing apps couldn’t do. There even is a green screen feature that you don’t even have to use a green screen for and you can select parts to use. I use capcut every day and there is unlimited possibilities with this app. I recommended it to a lot of people and they love it as well.

title: Amazing app! But I have a suggestion..
text: I love this app! It’s really easy to use, it’s simple, the videos turn out amazing, and it’s fun editing with this app! There’s one thing in particular that i have a suggestion for though. The new feature where you can record yourself and use cool-trendy filters is everything i could ask for! But i just wish you could export sound from a video in your camera role and stop and play again the video with the same sound, if you get what i’m saying. Like a lip sync, you know? But you can also pause what your doing, get into another position, and start recording with the sound exactly where you paused the video. I just think it’d be much more helpful for people like me, and i hope you consider adjusting it so that people can do this little recommendation. Thank for reading, have a great day!

title: I love this app but it needs a little bit tweaking
text: I love this app for making Gacha videos and videos of my friends and I! It’s filters, fonts, stickers, animations, and everything else is amazing! One thing that I find annoying is the overlay, when I import a picture I would sometimes need to adjust the photo if it’s too big or too small. Once adjusted I find it difficult to adjust the second picture to make both of them the same size. I was wondering if you could add some dimensions that shows how long and how wide the pictures are? Could you also add some way to type in the dimensions and the location of the photo so all you have to do is type the location and dimensions in the picture, making it move to the spot and be the same size of the first picture? PLEASE!! Find a way to fix this, I’m already having a hard time and I don’t wanna leave this app.

title: BEST EDITING APP EVER 🤩🤩🤩 just one thing 😞
text: I love editing its my life even capcut it’s so entertaining Gacha I one of my top things too do in capcut I live this app just one thing though the app is great but over the many months I’ve been using this app it started to not work as much anymore you see I’m not sure if it’s a glitch with the app like if you use it much or maybe my iPads software doesn’t work with it anymore it could really be anything what’s happening to the app is that all my favorite sounds are not in my favorites and everytime I go to a new sound bar it will say there’s no WiFi connection even when I still have full bar so I decided to delete the game then reinstall it again when I got back on it ALL MY VIDEOS WERE GONE 😡😡😡 I was so mad and I was out of options too make the app work again so yeah that’s my review so I’m pretty sure this is a glitch great app but please fix the glitch 😊

title: ♾️ recommend!
text:
Capcut is everything you need in a editing app and this is why.🤷🏽‍♀️ texts,overlays,effects,shakes,Ai,and more! First, Capcut gives you free texts and a lot of colors! so a bunchhh of texts+colors. You can also get ur own fonts from another website and put it on capcut! 
Next, Overlays. capcut gives you some overlays to work with! you can also import your own overlay. You can also use as many overlays as you choose! 
Next, effects. there is alottt of effects ! blurs,color effects,and more. Also if you really love one effect you could put it in ur favorites so you won’t have to go scrolling / looking for it again!
finally , Shakes! There is a bunch of shakes and you can adjuste how shakey or how much movement there is in it. There is also color shakes. close up shakes as well . 
That’s why i think you should choose capcut !

title: YES! But a few problems. 🥹
text:
Ok! This is an amazing editing app that helps you edit or change the look of your photo/video! There’s also a template section we’re you can watch other guests/members edits and use the template they used for it! I do not meet the age requirement to log in so all the 13 and above can enjoy more of CapCut! I just have a few problems, first, sometimes I get kicked out of the app randomly, but this doesn’t happen with other apps. My device is also fully updated. So I don’t know what’s going on. The good thing is it doesn’t loose my edits progress if it happens to kick me out mid edit. Another problem I’m having is that some templates will NOT load! This is either the editor’s problem or the apps. I’m not sending hate to developers and creators! I love you CapCut! And I use this app so much for my daily photos and edits! 😇

title: BEST APP FOR EDITING VIDEOS
text: Wish I could give the app more stars. All features are incredibly intuitive and can be quickly understood, which makes the app perfect for those new to video editing/edit videos for casual use. There’s also a hefty selection of tools which can even be overlapped to create more interesting effects. Everything is really so versatile, I feel like I can always learn something new to do. The best part of the app, though, is that it is COMPLETELY FREE!! There are NO IN-APP PURCHASES OR ADS, which is the downfall of every other editing app I’ve ever encountered. I actively worry every day that CapCut is going to introduce in-app purchases, because it’s genuinely unreal how GREAT this FREE app is. The best of its kind— if you have any interest in amateur videography, this app is a must. CapCut, if you’re reading this, please never start charging for features. I will cry lol

title: A few recommendations
text: Ok um this app is amazing I’ve been using it for 2-3 years now and I still haven’t learned everything! But I have a few things I request you add. First I was wonder if we could had thing where you hold down on the diamond and there’s a animation mode where you put all oth the parts your animating with and they are in layers That you can speed up, move, and colorize with effects and filters. If you want an example look up flamango animater tut on yt. Also can you make the slowmos more smooth? Whenever you slow something down the frame rate starts to be all staggered and delayed so it makes it look like a low quality vid. Also um can you make a filter for a flash and fade effect? Where it’s a white flash and it fades but it’s looks like it’s on the overlay setting? That’s all for now but IM HAVING TROUBLE REDOWNLOADING IT 😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

title: A MUST for digital creators. Period.
text: I've been using CapCut for months now and I'm truly impressed that they continue to update their app to match with the ever-changing trends in social media. The learning curve and layout for the app is that it's easy to start-off and use for beginners. Then, there are a lot of powerful options for more advanced users. I paid for all the features and it's a great investment for me. The only bug I've enoucntered is related to utilizing audio from TikTok and even after I login, it just seems buggy. In addition, I don't think it's seeing ALL of the audio tracks in my music library. But, typically, I use the audio that's on different platforms anyhow, so it's not a dealbreaker for me. But now they allow for Auto-Templates from TikTok and that makes everything even easier! Highly recommend!

title: BEST EDITING APP
text:
I have been using capcut for about 1 or 2 years and i am amazed on how a free editing app not only is super complexed but definitely the most easy editing app to use and understand٫ like i said ive been using it for 2 years (or 1 year) the stuff i am able to create is so good and the really good but difficult editing apps that i would use arent even that good compared to capcut٫ not only that but now that capcut is more popular the application regularly updates and with all of those updates capcut has went from a underrated editing app٫ to one of THE BEST editing apps that is still very underrated٫ i have been growing up and enjoying with capcut for 1 or 2 years and i am the person to enjoy it٫ when it comes to animating than it is one of the easiest and best editing apps to use when you wanna animate٫ 

Kind regards٫
Minal

title: I LOVE CAPCUT 💕 but it won’t let me use it
text: I LOVE CapCut if it did not give me a bad glitch I would definitely give it 5 stars ⭐️ but there is a weird glitch/bug. I would use CapCut all the time on my phone but then one day it started saying no WiFi please try again, so I went and checked my WiFi and it was perfectly fine so I looked it up online and apparently it’s a glitch and it could be fixed so I tried many videos to fix it but none worked so I had to try deleting the app and getting it again and when I reinstalled it it still said that so I lost all my edits for nothing. 😢PLEASE could you guys fix it 🥺🙏🙏. Other then that it’s an Amazing app and I love it ( I use it on my iPad now) and it’s wonderful such cool filters and stickers and I could use my green screen with it it’s so cool and free! I would %100 recommend this app. Could you guys PLEASE reply and try to fix this glitch 🥺🙏🙏

title: PLEASE FIX THE STORAGE/CACHE ISSUE!
text: I LOVE THIS APP! It is easy to use and I love that. I love everything about it except for one thing... it consumes A LOT of storage and even after I delete projects, it will still fill my storage. I have tried to clear the cache and it will say it’s clear yet still my storage is full from this app. I have to delete the app every time I use it to clear the “documents and data” storage. I appreciate that this app saves your videos so that you can delete them from your camera roll without them deleting in the app, but once I edit the videos, the parts I take out should delete from the storage too or something because it’s such a pain. I end up editing like an hour worth of videos down to 10-15 min total then can’t save the video cause my storage is full. Please please please just fix the cache so we can clear the data not used. Thanks

title: Awesome app. Would recommend
text: This app is absolutely awesome. I have made so many cool edits with my brother and quarantine friends. This app has legit saved me from boredom 1000 times. It has cool effects and great quality too. Me and my friends made a music video to the “Ai Ai Ai, I’m your little butterfly” song. And since CapCut has the “remove background” button (that is free) we could make my friends little brother sour through the sky.... like a little butterfly lol. I would also recommend this to people who vlog. Between the awesome effects and translation, you can make pro edits! You can also make Gacha stories with it. The only thing I would recommend tho is more anime-ish sound effects and effects. I also would suggest longer songs, maybe real ones that are popular but I understand due to copyright. Yeah, other than that great app! ✌️😁
